Articles: TSA Now Storming Public Places 8,000 Times a Year
 
 We now have hell on Earth happening people. Such abuses can't be allowed to continue.
 
 When the TSA was strictly limited to just airports we had to decide between not flying, and begrudgingly accepting having our junk grabbed. But now that they're deployed outside of federally controlled facilities and warrantlessly groping and violating people at bus stops and other public locations that has gone too far. The amount of abuse occurring is unacceptable and must be addressed.

 Please tell me this is a joke, because it's so bad it's almost funny. I don't think I've seen such a blatant violation of both the constitution and everything we believe in. Masked federal police in swat gear conducting random warrantless searches in public places? What is this, Iran?

Please tell me this is a joke, because it's so bad it's almost funny. I don't think I've seen such a blatant violation of both the constitution and everything we believe in. Masked federal police in swat gear conducting random warrantless searches in public places? What is this, Iran?

 
 Afraid it's the truth. Without congressional approval or constitutional authority the TSA is being elevated to a full force threat, pushing harder and harder against the people. 
 
 And knowing what we do from history about angry people in the middle of an economic crisis when the government starts pushing them harder and harder, this may very well be the straw that breaks the camel's back and causes the pressure cooker to explode.
 
 And considering how liberals are gonna be getting junk groped just like everyone else when in a public place like a bus stop, they might be joining the anti-government movement because they don't wanna get violated and molested.
